headline: This ‘Typical 3-Year-Old’  Was Invited to Join Mensa
abstract: Muhammad Haryz Nadzim became the youngest current Mensa member after scoring 142 on an I.Q. test. Above 145 is considered “genius or near genius.”
lead_paragraph: LONDON — He reads fluently (while wearing a Gruffalo costume), he does math with ease and he can explain scientific concepts such as how rain forms.
